full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGE LDAN BSTAN PA RGYAS PA'I SMON LAM LEGS TSOGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MER GENG WANG SHOG GI CHOS RJE'I SPRUL SKU SNA TSOGS RDO RJES DNGUL GYI MAndAL KHA BTAGS BCAS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DGE SBYONGS BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI NYI MA DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS GNAS MCHOG RI BO DVANGS BSIL GYI NYE 'DAB PHU SA TING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI NYI MA DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL,
